posts.heading: Game Description
posts.post:
GameName is a multi-platform top-down real-time strategy game. Seek to gain control of a world through commanding, upgrading, and recruiting various special units. Use your units to help settle, destroy, or scatter and find resources throughout the world. Resources enable you to create items, structures, and many more. Establish your presence and claim your territory as you seek to outdo those who stand in your way.

Release Date: TBA

posts.heading: Welcome!
posts.post:
Hello visitor! Welcome to the brand new offical webpage for GameName! More details to follow as the game and website are still in development. For now, enjoy the video which is completely irrelevant to our game and company.

Thanks for visiting!
-The Team
